entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a person who quickly spoke to Harry and gripped his pink umbrella tightly.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main character who is being measured by Mr. Ollivander for his wand.

entities.name: mr ollivander
entities.description: Mr. Ollivander is a person who is measuring Harry's arm to find his wand.

entities.name: unicorn hairs
entities.description: Unicorn hairs are used as the core of powerful magical substances in Ollivander wands.

relationships.description: Hagrid gripped his pink umbrella tightly.
Mr. Ollivander held a long tape measure with silver markings out of his pocket.
Harry will use an Ollivander wand.
